Html:
With the next release coming soon I'd like to fix as much as possible to have sequence reconstruction handle most cases. I've fixed most of the things, but I need some reports from those using the dev builds.

For best performance I suggest disabling automatic armor and manually selecting it under buffs, enabling global optimizations and segment cooldowns and integral mana consumables for display. The expected working range is for up to 6 min fights, but up to 10 min should work also if you're prepared to wait about a minute to get the solution.

I'm looking for xml files where sequence reconstruction gets a score below 100. If you have any just open a new issue here and I'll take a look at it. Some things that I know aren't working yet are drums of battle and serpent-coil braid, so reports that don't use these should have a priority since I probably don't know that they're broken.

Mine's not showing a score, does that count?  :)

(dev build as of a few mins ago.)
It only shows score if it's below 100, so no problems there :)
